scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..

write.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

write.readability.threshold.description: Score threshold for the automated readability index in vscode-write, set to 0 to turn it off and see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Automated_readability_index for what it means

write.write-good.passive.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good passive voice checks.

write.write-good.illusion.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good lexical illusion checks, cases where words are repeated.

write.write-good.so.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good 'so' check, checking for so at the beginning of sentences.

write.write-good.thereIs.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good 'there is' and 'there are' checks at the beginning of a sentence.

write.write-good.weasel.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good weasel word checks.

write.write-good.adverb.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good check for adverbs that weaken meaning.

write.write-good.tooWordy.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good checks for phrases that are unnecessarily wordy.

write.write-good.cliches.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good check for common cliches.

write.write-good.eprime.description: Whether or not to enable the write-good checks for 'to-be' words.
